pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:4.1: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:5.1: 84. The training rule on sunshades and sandals
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.3: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.4: At that time the nuns from the group of six used sunshades and sandals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:6.6: “How can the nuns use sunshades and sandals? They are just like lay people who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.3: “How can the nuns from the group of six use sunshades and sandals?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.7: How can the nuns from the group of six use sunshades and sandals?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:8.2: ‘If a nun uses a sunshade and sandals, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:9.1: In this way the Master laid down this training rule for the nuns.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.2: At one time there was a sick nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.3: and she was not comfortable without sandals and a sunshade. …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.5: “Monks, I allow a sick nun to use a sunshade and sandals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:10.6: And so, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:11.1: ‘If a nun who is not sick uses a sunshade and sandals, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:12.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:13.2: who is comfortable without a sunshade and sandals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:14.2: who is not comfortable without a sunshade and sandals.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:15.2: there are three kinds of sunshade: the white sunshade; the reed sunshade; the leaf sunshade, either bound at the rim or bound at the ribs.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:15.4: if she uses it even once, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.1: If she is not sick, and she does not perceive herself as sick, and she uses a sunshade and sandals, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.2: If she is not sick, but she is unsure of it, and she uses a sunshade and sandals, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:16.3: If she is not sick, but she perceives herself as sick, and she uses a sunshade and sandals, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.1: If she uses a sunshade, but not sandals, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.2: If she uses sandals, but not a sunshade, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.3: If she is sick, but she does not perceive herself as sick, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.4: If she is sick, but she is unsure if she is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:17.5: If she is sick, and she perceives herself as sick, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:18.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:19.1: The first training rule is finished.
